Sammamish.KRWM:
KRWM (106.9 MHz) is a commercial FM radio station licensed to Bremerton, Washington and serving the Seattle/Puget Sound region. It is owned by Hubbard Broadcasting, and airs an adult contemporary radio format, using the moniker "Warm 106.9."
KRWM broadcasts with 49,000 watts effective radiated power (ERP) on a tower 1302 feet in height above average terrain (HAAT). Its transmitter is located near Issaquah on Cougar Mountain, with studios and offices located at Newport Corporate Center in Bellevue.
